div.span: Welding students are to read chapter 4 (pg 37-47) in their textbook and answer the questions on pg 48. Students may email or "share" their answers for feedback. DUE 3/25
Welding students are to read chapter 5 (pg 51-62) in their textbook and answer the questions on pg 63. Students may email or "share" their answers for feedback. DUE 4/3

div.span: 2. Read the novel, A Long Walk to Water
3. Read your Close Reader, soft cover text, pp 75-92 andcomplete the assignments .
English 10 Honors- all students picked up your work! Thank you!
We have suspended the research paper project for now.

p.span: Class meeting time: 2nd period B/D Spring 2020

span.a: ELA 9 Periods 1,3, 5 IC Week 2 Independent Reading
ELA 8 Honors Lessons 10, 14, 19, and 10.2 (pages 34-47) Answer Sheet

p.span: I am going to miss girls!!!

If I can figure out a way to have you finish the movie, I will and Ill let you know. If not, we have like 20 minutes to finish when we come back. I have the next chapter we were going to start ready for you. Do the best you can, its the imperfect subjunctive you are trying to teach yourselves, so use your notes and dont get frustrated. Try to use your notes and do activities 1-9. CHECK FOR IMPERFECT SUBJUNCITVE--NEW USE FOR US--Pages 259-270 should help!
You can email me, remind app or Google Hangout...I am here for you!!!
Stay safe and get outside and get some fresh air when you can. Hope to see you soon!!! <3

span.a: Spanish 1B hard copy packet (mostly 8th grade students)

Here's the reading schedule for the next three weeks.If you didn't pick up the packet with the readings, one will be mailed home to you.Youtube videos will be posted in the coming days of each section being read by me!

div.span: *Google Classroom - ENL Lab - Please complete 2 assignments per week
Continue working on IXL - if you have not completed the Diagnostic, please do that first prior to doing grade level math or language arts.
Instructors: Ms.Pasco, Mrs. Wahl, Ms. Meyer

span.a: Exit Ticket 1 is due 3/22. Exit Ticket 2 is due by 3/29. Handout is due by 4/5.

Extra Credit Opportunity! Email me (kreber@soduscsd.org) and tell me either. . .
A. about a book you are currently reading
B. the title of your favorite book and why it tops your list.

div.span: Information for internship students: All internships are on hold until we return from the COVID 19 recess. IF we return as scheduled, there will be time for all Seniors to complete their internship hours. Students who have finished hours and owe thank you letters and other internship documentation will be contacted individually by Mrs. VanAcker. Thank you for your patience during this difficult time. We will get everything done as needed!! No worries. Stay safe. Mrs. VanAcker
